comment.author: 80071992@N06
comment._content: Is great grandmother Longanecker referring to Mariah Gsell Longanecker, and if so, is this the same house that is in the picture showing great grandfather Longanecker's home?

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: The great grandmother Longanecker in this photograph refers to Lydia (Showalter) Longanecker who was married to Jacob Longanecker. Thank you for asking!
